negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.agentx

Class DiscreteIssueProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.agentx.DiscreteIssueProcessor

  • public class DiscreteIssueProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for processing discrete issues, weighting them based on opponent bids. Also contains functionality for opponent stubbornness.
    Author:
    E. Jacobs

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a DiscreteIssueProcessor for a domain, given a certain utility.
      DiscreteIssueProcessor(Domain d)
      Creates a DiscreteIssueProcessor for a domain.

      Gives a descending list of the issues ordered by weight, so the highest weighted issue is first in the list

    • Method Detail

      • getIssueList

        public java.util.ArrayList<IssueDiscrete> getIssueList()

      • adaptWeightsByBid

        public void adaptWeightsByBid(Bid currentBid,
                              double time)
        Adapts the different issue weights according to the current bid the opponent has made. Issues with more changes get a lower weight
        Parameters:
        currentBid - Bid done by the opponent
        time - Time at which the bid was done

      • getOrderedIssueList

        public java.util.ArrayList<IssueDiscrete> getOrderedIssueList()
        Gives a descending list of the issues ordered by weight, so the highest weighted issue is first in the list
        Returns:
        A list of discrete issues, ordered by weight

      • getWeightByIssue

        public double getWeightByIssue(IssueDiscrete i)
        Gives the weight that belongs to the given issue
        Parameters:
        i - Issue for which the weight is required
        Returns:
        The weight for the given issue
